message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to you is $10000. Let me know if you're interested!

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $9500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $10000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your hesitation, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to lower the price to $10500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you is $10000. Let me know if you're interested!

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to offer $9000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $10000.

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10250. This is my final offer. Let me know if you're interested!

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to offer $9500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $10000.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to reach an agreement, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10750. This is my last offer. Let me know if you're interested!

Alice, I understand that you're making a final offer, but I'm still not willing to pay $10750. I'm willing to offer $9200 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $10000.

I'm disappointed that we're not getting closer to an agreement, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10500. This is my absolute final offer. Let me know if you're interested!

Alice, I understand that you're making a final offer, but I'm still not willing to pay $10500. I'm willing to offer $9000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $10000.
